content:
Diagnosis
	1. Prostate adenocarcinoma T2bN0M0

	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Transrectal ultrasound guided prostate biopsy

	Radiotherapy
	Started 1 Mar 2024 - Radical IMRT 74Gy in 37 fractions, currently at fraction 20

	Hormone therapy
	Leuprorelin 3-monthly depot commenced 1 Feb 2024

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	Responding to treatment

	Current issues
	Mild urinary frequency

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today at fraction 20 of radiotherapy. Tolerating treatment well with only grade 1 urinary frequency, managed with increased fluid intake. No bowel symptoms. Performance status remains 0. PSA has dropped from 7.8 at diagnosis to 0.4 on latest check. Examination shows good performance status, no concerning features.

	Further investigations
	PSA check in 6 weeks

	Medication prescribed
	Continue Leuprorelin

	Follow up
	Next oncology follow up will be at completion of radiotherapy

	Required GP actions
	None required

patient_facts.value: Good performance status, no concerning features

status_updates.value: Localized prostate cancer responding well to radical chemoradiotherapy with good PSA response and minimal toxicity
Grade 1 urinary frequency managed with increased fluid intake
Continuing with planned radiotherapy, currently at fraction 20 of 37
